title: Ren√© Bethmann | Senior Innovation Manager | VAUDE - Fibre2fashion.com
summary: VAUDE, a European outdoor equipment supplier, emphasizes its commitment to sustainability and social responsibility through innovative practices and materials in its products. The company focuses on moving away from fossil fuel-based materials and utilizing renewable carbon solutions while fostering a culture of transparency and collaboration. Recent innovations include the commercialization of textile products using waste tyres and a new ReCircle Collection emphasizing recyclability. VAUDE integrates sustainability into its innovation process through the Green Shape System, ensuring all developments align with environmental standards.
green_innovation: TRUE: The article discusses VAUDE's innovative practices that contribute to environmental sustainability, such as using renewable materials and implementing recycling technologies.
business_innovation: TRUE: VAUDE introduces new and improved products and business processes that significantly differ from previous offerings, addressing market demand for sustainable outdoor gear.
green_product: TRUE: The products highlighted in the article, including those made from waste tyres, align with the definition of green products as they are designed to reduce environmental impact.
green_process: TRUE: The article mentions processes aimed at recycling challenging materials and adopting energy-efficient technologies, which are consistent with the definition of green processes.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 451110 - Sporting Goods Stores, 315210 - Cut and Sew Apparel Manufacturing, 325199 - All Other Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services
greenwashing: FALSE: The article does not suggest any misleading statements about the environmental benefits of VAUDE's products; rather, it provides a detailed account of their genuine efforts toward sustainability.

title: Metaverse Marketing: How Brands Can Build Stronger Connections in Virtual Worlds - Indian Retailer
summary: The article discusses the ongoing development and future potential of the Metaverse as a marketing channel for brands, emphasizing the importance of consumer engagement and creating meaningful experiences. It outlines the necessity for companies to clearly define their objectives, select suitable platforms, and innovate within this virtual space to connect with audiences. The text highlights that businesses must assess risks, redefine success metrics, and continuously adapt to the evolving landscape of innovation and consumer adoption in the Metaverse.
green_innovation: FALSE, this is not green innovation as it does not refer to innovations specifically aimed at reducing environmental impact or promoting sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE, it is a business innovation as it discusses the development of the Metaverse as a new and improved platform for brand engagement, significantly differing from traditional marketing methods.
green_product: FALSE, there is no good or service mentioned in the article that meets the definition of a green product.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not detail any process that minimizes environmental impacts or promotes sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 541613 - Marketing Consulting Services, 541511 - Custom Computer Programming Services, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services, 511210 - Software Publishers.
greenwashing: FALSE, the article does not exhibit characteristics of greenwashing, as it does not make misleading claims about environmental benefits but focuses on marketing efforts within the Metaverse.
